pastInterns.name: Andy Bernatow
pastInterns.description: Did React Native development for a commercially available mobile app. Worked mostly independently. Was also a part of a 'Shark Tank' style project in which we did market research on a proposed new project for the company.

pastInterns.name: Akansha Negi
pastInterns.description: While interning at Clayco, I developed a lot of front-end for the companys mobile and web applications using React, JavaScript, Typescript and JSX. I also built the entire front end of one of a React applications from scratch, as well as worked on coding one of the companys personal libraries that will be used in all future Clayco applications.
